JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
In Finance & IT, we are working to optimize the overall value chain in VikingGenetics by ensuring effective business support processes, systems, and compliance. We have initiated a series of initiatives aimed at standardizing, digitizing, and integrating automation solutions wherever possible.
You could be our new Financial Controller if you enjoy being close to the daily delivery, where the organizational intersection is wide. The right candidate thrives in a changeable environment, where you will need to help establish and optimize new processes, while you at the same time deliver on specific task.
You will become part of Finance & IT with direct reference to the Head of Accounting.

Your main tasks will be:
  • Daily bookkeeping in our sales companies worldwide.
  • Preparation and quality check of accounting statements and monthly reporting as well as consolidation of the companies in the group.
  • Ensure that accounting data in group companies are reliable and accurate so that we continue to comply with Danish and international regulatory requirements.
  • Participate in inter-organizational and international cooperation to implement business projects and optimize business processes.
  • Group controlling of payroll.
  • Help ensure that must-win battles are implemented in the Finance area.
Workplace: Your workplace will be in Assentoft, close to Randers.

Your qualifications:
  • You have a finance degree, eg. HD(R) or cand.merc.aud
  • 3-4 years of practical experience from the audit industry or controller experience
  • Knowledge about Nordic accounting rules, VAT and Tax
  • Extensive experience with Navision, Microsoft package and have knowledge with BI tools.
We expect you to have:
  • Evident planning and organizational skills
  • Prominent social skills and ability to handle cultural differences, internally and externally
  • First class communication skills, able to operate structured, professionally, and effectively
  • Fluent in spoken and written English. Further language skills will be appreciated
  • The ability to work independently taking responsibility for your own task
We offer you:
An exciting job with opportunities for professional and personal development in a high-functioning finance team with a solid team spirit. We value initiative, enthusiasm, responsibility and the right balance between creativity and quality in all solutions.
A position in a professional and dedicated company, and the opportunity to influence the development of the whole company.
